title: Customization UX
description: Live preview and form-based customization of landing page sections

requirements.title: Split customization layout
requirements.description: Each slide customization page shows form (one column) + live preview (other column), stacked on mobile

validation.notes: Responsive grid layout verified via test. Implementation: lg:grid-cols-2 for split view on desktop, stacked on mobile. Form in left column (data-testid='section-form'), preview in right column (data-testid='section-preview').

requirements.notes: Implemented via responsive grid in SectionEditor.tsx (line 164). Layout splits at lg breakpoint, stacks below. Validated by unit tests.

requirements.title: Live preview updates
requirements.description: Form field changes update preview within 300ms (debounced) without page reload

validation.notes: useDebounce hook with 300ms delay verified by test checking debounce indicator text. Implementation uses debouncedContent which updates automatically when form fields change.

requirements.notes: Implemented via useDebounce hook (300ms) in SectionEditor.tsx. Form changes trigger debounced state updates that automatically refresh the live preview without page reload. Validated by unit tests.
